name: Date Me
description:
DATE ME

Have you ever wanted to date a game designer? 

Always wanted to steal my heart?

Too intimated to ask me out? 

Wished I wasn't a lesbian?

Well heres a cringey FMV game made for school where you get to date yours truly~

The game world takes place in a fictional world called Game Design Heights which is  a Grey's Anatomy spoof set in a game design program. Episode one can be found here: Game Design Heights

Developers:

Yours truly, Heather: 

Itch.io: Snorkelhead Twitter:  @Snorkelhead

Emily:

 Itch.io: Bendevious Twitter: @emilybendevis

Ps. There's a ton of embarrassing endings. Don't mention them, thnx.
